name: 13" Acacia Cake Stand Rotating – Rustic Wood Pedestal Stands Turntable with 2 Icing Spatulas, 3 Smoothers – Wooden Spinning Cake Decorating Serving for Cupcake Dessert Display in Party, Wedding
short_description: Natural Material: Crafted from Acacia wood, renowned for its durability and elegance. Whether as a housewarming gift, a birthday surprise, or part of a Christmas gift set Easy to Clean: After use, simply wipe the turner with a damp cloth and promptly dry. To keep it looking pristine, occasionally wipe it with mineral oil (avoid using olive or vegetable oil) for lasting quality

name: Rotatable Square Cake Stand with Lid，11in Bamboo Cake Stand with Dome，360° Rotating Display Stand with Acrylic Cover for Cheese，Pie，Chips & Dips，Square Cake Spinner，Lazy Susan Platter with Cover
short_description: ELEGANT ROTATABLE SQUARE CAKE STAND--Simple styling and rotatable design make this square cake stand an elegant choice for presenting cakes, cupcakes，pastries，desserts or any other baked goods，it creates an eye-catching display and highlights the natural beauty of artisanal desserts，at the same time，it keeps cakes&desserts fresh for longer.Designed to showcase both round and square cakes up to 4.6" tall. ROTATABLE DESIGN--Revolves effortlessly on premium metal ball bearings，it breaks the traditional way of cake display. It is 360° rotatable and very smooth，you can freely DIY your own cake and decorate the cake with patterns on it，when you have completed all the plating on it, just rotate it and it will give you a perfect display and service effect! HANDCRAFTED NATURAL BAMBOO BOARD---The board is hand-crafted from solid，natural and sustainable bamboo,each piece is carefully selected and hand-polished，then crafted through a 500°F deep carbonization process to never mold and oil rubbed for a smooth surface，makes an elevated presentation of for anything from cheeses and accompaniments to whole cakes to hors d'oeuvres and confections. HIGHLY TRANSPARENT&SHATTER-PROOF ACRYLIC DOME--The square acrylic dome balances luxurious quality and fresh modern style and is topped with a ball lid grip for easy lifting.Acrylic is a highly transparent material like glass, but it is lightweight and shatter-proof and less likely to break compared to glass. PERFECT FOR SERVING AND DISPLAYING--With its cool touch and natural elegance, our square cake stand makes a stunning presentation at the table.Whether displaying cakes，cucakes，pastries, small sandwiches or decadent desserts, this elegant stand brings a touch of whimsy to special gatherings.The stand coordinates perfectly with your beautiful dinnerware and pairs easily with other table settings. A GREAT HOSTESS GIFT--Each piece is a reminder how a special baking gift or wedding registry gift can create memories, ‘make the moment’ and be treasured forever.Makes for an excellent gift for birthdays, weddings, and any occasion where smiles and sweetness are desired.We believe that the person who loves baking&desserts receives this cake stand will definitely use it every day with joy. DIMENSIONS&MORE INFO--Overall: 11.1"L x 11.1"W x 7"H，Dome: 9.9"L x 9.9"W x 5.7"H，Plate: 11.1"L x 11.1"W，0.6“ thick.This cake stand can hold a 9.5" diam., 4.6" high square or round cake.USE&CARE--Wipe clean with a dry or damp soft cloth.
